verbs.description: [V: remembering] ‘ [ARG1: the silver fox’ barbara bush] — and robin only two women were both wife to a president and mother to a president one was abigail adams who died 200 years ago october 28 1818 the other was barbara bush who died yesterday april 17 2018 mrs bush was 92 years old silver fox nancy reagan robin bush george h w bush barbara bush george w bush barbara bush and robin
